ComicInfo.Title: Sire
ComicInfo.Summary: The first property from Top Cow and Heroes and Villains Entertainment is here! FBI tracker Alex O'Roark and his partner Jezebel Kendal race against the clock to capture the serial killer Herod before he kills again. When Herod drags Alex's fianc√©, Tory, into their game of cat and mouse, Alex may unleash the beast caged within...
